attributes.action: Review the dismantling of our NHS by stealth transfer/restructure/redundancy
attributes.additional_details: We have been contacted by members of community, charity, veteran, and religious groups who are deeply concerned about the unfair government stealth and incremental dismantling of the NHS. Staff will be contacting representatives from these groups & others requesting support - we need your support. Darzi is ignored, reorganisation, his recommendations focus on making the existing structure work better without upheaval. Mergers & TUPE  transfers continue, this hindered rather than helped the NHS
attributes.background: ACT - ASAP - NHS staff face unfair job losses after a transfer, they are leaving, anxious & sick with worry about their future and the impact on NHS patients. If redundancies continue unchecked, the ripple effect could harm patient care & beak the NHS Job Losses and the endless cuts.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
